verses.verse: <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H539>believed<s%> our <S%H8052>message<s%>? And to <S%H4310>whom<s%> has the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> been <S%H1540>revealed<s%>?

For He <S%H5927>grew<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> Him like a <S%H3126>tender<s%> <S%H3126>shoot,<s%> And like a <S%H8328>root<s%> out of <S%H6723>parched<s%> <S%H776>ground;<s%> He has <S%H3808>no<s%> [stately] <S%H8389>form<s%> or <S%H1926>majesty<s%> That we should <S%H7200>look<s%> upon Him, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H4758>appearance<s%> that we should be <S%H2530>attracted<s%> to Him.

He was <S%H959>despised<s%> and <S%H2310>forsaken<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4341>sorrows,<s%> and <S%H3045>acquainted<s%> with <S%H2483>grief;<s%> And like one from whom men <S%H4564>hide<s%> their <S%H6440>face,<s%> He was <S%H959>despised,<s%> and we did not <S%H2803>esteem<s%> Him.

<S%H403>Surely<s%> our <S%H2483>griefs<s%> He <S%H1931>Himself<s%> <S%H5375>bore,<s%> And our <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> He <S%H5445>carried;<s%> Yet we <S%H587>ourselves<s%> <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> Him <S%H5060>stricken,<s%> <S%H5221>Smitten<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>

But He was <S%H9135>pierced<s%> <S%H9135>through<s%> for our <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> He was <S%H1792>crushed<s%> for our <S%H5771>iniquities;<s%> The <S%H4148>chastening<s%> for our well-being [fell] upon Him, And by His <S%H2250>scourging<s%> we are <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> of us like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> have <S%H8582>gone<s%> <S%H8582>astray,<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> of us has <S%H6437>turned<s%> to his own <S%H1870>way;<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has caused the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of us <S%H3605>all<s%> To <S%H6293>fall<s%> on Him.

He was <S%H5065>oppressed<s%> and He was <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> Yet He did not <S%H6605>open<s%> His <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> Like a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that is <S%H2986>led<s%> to <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> And like a <S%H7353>sheep<s%> that is <S%H481>silent<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> its <S%H1494>shearers,<s%> So He did not <S%H6605>open<s%> His <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

By <S%H6115>oppression<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> He was <S%H3947>taken<s%> away; And as for His <S%H1755>generation,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7878>considered<s%> That He was <S%H1504>cut<s%> <S%H1504>off<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> For the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> to whom the <S%H5061>stroke<s%> [was due?]

His <S%H6913>grave<s%> was <S%H5414>assigned<s%> with <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>men,<s%> Yet He was with a <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H6223>man<s%> in His <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> He had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>violence,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> was there any <S%H4820>deceit<s%> in His <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> To <S%H1792>crush<s%> Him, <S%H2470>putting<s%> [Him] to <S%H2470>grief;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> He would <S%H7760>render<s%> <S%H5315>Himself<s%> [as] a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> He will <S%H7200>see<s%> [His] <S%H2233>offspring,<s%> He will <S%H748>prolong<s%> [His] <S%H3117>days,<s%> And the <S%H2656>good<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in His <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

As a <S%H4480>result<s%> of the <S%H5999>anguish<s%> of His <S%H5315>soul,<s%> He will <S%H7200>see<s%> [it] and be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> By His <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H6662>Righteous<s%> <S%H6662>One,<s%> My <S%H5650>Servant,<s%> will <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7227>many,<s%> As He will <S%H5445>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> I will <S%H2505>allot<s%> Him a <S%H2505>portion<s%> with the <S%H7227>great,<s%> And He will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>booty<s%> with the <S%H6099>strong;<s%> <S%H8478>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> He <S%H6168>poured<s%> out <S%H5315>Himself<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> And was <S%H4487>numbered<s%> with the <S%H6586>transgressors;<s%> Yet He <S%H1931>Himself<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H2399>sin<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> And <S%H6293>interceded<s%> for the <S%H6586>transgressors.<s%>
